last_episode_to_air.name: Part 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the hunt for Lee Murray goes global, authorities are forced to get creative in their efforts in order to get their man. Unprecedented police efforts and legal maneuvering lead to a historic result. Lee Murray’s voice provides never before revealed information and details into what really happened in the Securitas heist. Series finale.

name: Catching Lightning
overview: The story of MMA fighter, 'Lightning' Lee Murray, who brawled his way from the mean streets of South London all the way to the UFC - and then took part one of the largest bank heists of all-time.

episodes.name: Part 1
episodes.overview: A ferocious attitude coupled with knockout power and lightning-fast hands earned Lee Murray a fearsome reputation on the streets of South London. Murray begins training with MMA legends and sets his sights on becoming a UFC champion. Fighters, MMA coaches, and police investigators recount the rise and fall of Murray’s career.

episodes.name: Part 2
episodes.overview: A Christmas holiday with family takes a violent turn and tragically alters Lee’s life forever. After a battle with an MMA legend, Lee Murray is savagely attacked on the streets of London. In the sleepy town of Tonbridge, England, what begins as a normal work shift for the employees of the Securitas cash depot, ends as a terrifying ordeal that alters history.

episodes.name: Part 3
episodes.overview: The Kent Police investigation into the Securitas heist begins with overwhelming media coverage. A record-breaking cash reward put forward to aid in the investigation brings immediate results. Police begin to put pieces of the puzzle together at a rapid speed. The massive Kent Police force working the case begin to feel confident about their plan to catch the robbers, however Lee Murray and friends have a plan of their own.

episodes.name: Part 4
episodes.overview: As the hunt for Lee Murray goes global, authorities are forced to get creative in their efforts in order to get their man. Unprecedented police efforts and legal maneuvering lead to a historic result. Lee Murray’s voice provides never before revealed information and details into what really happened in the Securitas heist. Series finale.
